name: Crafted_Winters_Gift_A
display_help: Enhances the range of a teleport power by {Boost.Attrib.Range.Scale}%, the flight speed of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Movement.Scale}%, the jumping ability of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Movement.Scale}% and the run speed of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Movement.Scale}%. NOTE: This enhancement can be slotted into any travel power and will enhance run speed, jumping, flight speed and teleport range. UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.

name: Crafted_Winters_Gift_B
display_help: Enhances the range of a teleport power by {Boost.Attrib.Range.Scale}%, the flight speed of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Movement.Scale}%, the jumping ability of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Movement.Scale}%, the run speed of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Movement.Scale}% and reduces the endurance cost of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Endurance.Scale}%. NOTE: This enhancement can be slotted into any travel power and will enhance run speed, jumping, flight speed and teleport range. UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character.

name: Crafted_Winters_Gift_C
